articles.title: 'Cause you're a Singapore boy': US rappers' song sparks creative spin-offs on TikTok - AsiaOne
articles.description: There are many ways to show off one's national identity, but some TikTokers have found a better option — by using a soundbite from an American rapper. The viral TikTok soundbite goes, "Cause you're a Singapore boy, or you an island boy". American rapper Flyys…
articles.content:

articles.title: Blair Tuke confirms he and Peter Burling are involved in SailGP for long haul - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: They are NZ's highest profile sailors and while it's unclear whether they'll stay with Team NZ in America's Cup, they're loving life in SailGP.
articles.content:
Where Blair Tuke and Peter Burlings futures lie in the Americas Cup is still a mystery, but that certainly cant be said about their commitment to SailGP.

articles.title: COVID-19 still found a way into a fully vaccinated crowd. Will Omicron make 'breakthrough infections' worse? - 07-Dec-2021 - NZ Education news - NZCity
articles.description: While the world waits anxiously for information about Omicron, experts warn that Delta is still the dominant variant across the globe. An outbreak at an American high school reunion shows the power of the virus — and the potency of vaccines.
articles.content:
High school reunions have always been fraught with the possibility of awkwardness. 
When you hold one in a pandemic, the gathering of old friends, lovers and rivals becomes infinitely trickier.
The… [+5774 chars]
